Lines: âˆˆ
Dobday landship is leading unit of our forces
through weakpoint in Federation encirclement.
Our next job is to open a path for them.
Landships are valuable units,
so we don't want to lose it in vain.
Leo...
Its not an official order, are we still going to do it?
Its a request from outside of our chain of command...
I we'd wait for official orders to catch up,
our allies will be long lost.
We'll do it on my own discretion.
We'll follow your decision.
You are our commander.
I have no objection as well.
Me too! I trust captain's judgement!
Haha, then it's decided!
From now on, Brauer's team will operate on our own
acting as independent guerrila unit.
Leave the materiel procurement to me.
I'll make it better than regular troops.
Haaha... it's starting to be fun.
Ha ha ha!
If you can say that in this situation, you'll pass, young lady.
Good. Brauer's Team, prepare to sortie!
Roger that!
